verses.verse: למנצח <WH5329> To the chief Musician, לדוד <WH1732> of David. מזמור <WH4210> A Psalm אלהי <WH430> thy peace, O God תהלתי <WH8416> of my praise; אל <WH408> not תחרשׁ׃ <WH2790> Hold

כי <WH3588> For פי <WH6310> the mouth רשׁע <WH7563> of the wicked ופי <WH6310> and the mouth מרמה <WH4820> of the deceitful עלי <WH5921> against פתחו <WH6605> are opened דברו <WH1696> me: they have spoken אתי <WH854> against לשׁון <WH3956> tongue. שׁקר׃ <WH8267> me with a lying
ודברי <WH1697> also with words שׂנאה <WH8135> of hatred; סבבוני <WH5437> They compassed me about וילחמוני <WH3898> and fought against חנם׃ <WH2600> me without a cause.
תחת <WH8478> For אהבתי <WH160> my love ישׂטנוני <WH7853> they are my adversaries: ואני <WH589> but I תפלה׃ <WH8605> prayer.
וישׂימו <WH7760> עליעה <WH7451> me evil תחת <WH8478> for טובה <WH2896> good, ושׂנאה <WH8135> and hatred תחת <WH8478> for אהבתי׃ <WH160> my love.
הפקד <WH6485> Set עליו <WH5921> over רשׁע <WH7563> thou a wicked man ושׂטן <WH7854> him: and let Satan יעמד <WH5975> stand על <WH5921> at ימינו׃ <WH3225> his right hand.
בהשׁפטו <WH8199> When he shall be judged, יצא <WH3318> let him be condemned: רשׁע <WH7563> let him be condemned: ותפלתו <WH8605> his prayer תהיה <WH1961> become לחטאה׃ <WH2401> sin.
יהיו <WH1961> be ימיו <WH3117> Let his days מעטים <WH4592> few; פקדתו <WH6486> his office. יקח <WH3947> take אחר׃ <WH312> let another
יהיו <WH1961> be בניו <WH1121> Let his children יתומים <WH3490> fatherless, ואשׁתו <WH802> and his wife אלמנה׃ <WH490> a widow.

ונוע <WH5128> be continually vagabonds, ינועו <WH5128> be continually vagabonds, בניו <WH1121> Let his children ושׁאלו <WH7592> and beg: ודרשׁו <WH1875> let them seek מחרבותיהם׃ <WH2723> also out of their desolate places.
ינקשׁ <WH5367> catch נושׁה <WH5383> Let the extortioner לכל <WH3605> all אשׁר <WH834> that לו ויבזו <WH962> spoil זרים <WH2114> he hath; and let the strangers יגיעו׃ <WH3018> his labor.

אל <WH408> none יהי <WH1961> Let there be לו משׁך <WH4900> to extend חסד <WH2617> mercy ואל <WH408> unto him: neither יהי <WH1961> let there be חונן <WH2603> any to favor ליתומיו׃ <WH3490> his fatherless children.
יהי <WH1961> be אחריתו <WH319> Let his posterity להכרית <WH3772> cut off; בדור <WH1755> in the generation אחר <WH312> following ימח <WH4229> be blotted out. שׁמם׃ <WH8034> let their name

יזכר <WH2142> be remembered עון <WH5771> Let the iniquity אבתיו <WH1> of his fathers אל <WH413> with יהוה <WH3068> the LORD; וחטאת <WH2403> the sin אמו <WH517> of his mother אל <WH408> and let not תמח׃ <WH4229> be blotted out.
יהיו <WH1961> Let them be נגד <WH5048> before יהוה <WH3068> the LORD תמיד <WH8548> continually, ויכרת <WH3772> that he may cut off מארץ <WH776> of them from the earth. זכרם׃ <WH2143> the memory

יען <WH3282> Because אשׁר <WH834> that לא <WH3808> not זכר <WH2142> he remembered עשׂות <WH6213> to show חסד <WH2617> mercy, וירדף <WH7291> but persecuted אישׁ <WH376> man, עני <WH6041> the poor ואביון <WH34> and needy ונכאה <WH5218> לבב <WH3824> in heart. למותת׃ <WH4191> that he might even slay

ויאהב <WH157> As he loved קללה <WH7045> cursing, ותבואהו <WH935> so let it come ולא <WH3808> not חפץ <WH2654> unto him: as he delighted בברכה <WH1293> in blessing, ותרחק <WH7368> so let it be far ממנו׃ <WH4480> from

וילבשׁ <WH3847> As he clothed קללה <WH7045> himself with cursing כמדו <WH4055> like as with his garment, ותבא <WH935> so let it come כמים <WH4325> like water, בקרבו <WH7130> into his bowels וכשׁמן <WH8081> and like oil בעצמותיו׃ <WH6106> into his bones.
תהי <WH1961> Let it be לו כבגד <WH899> unto him as the garment יעטה <WH5844> covereth ולמזח <WH4206> him, and for a girdle תמיד <WH8548> continually. יחגרה׃ <WH2296> wherewith he is girded

זאת <WH2063> this פעלת <WH6468> the reward שׂטני <WH7853> of mine adversaries מאת <WH853> יהוה <WH3068> the LORD, והדברים <WH1696> and of them that speak רע <WH7451> evil על <WH5921> against נפשׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul.

ואתה <WH859> thou יהוה <WH3069> me, O GOD אדני <WH136> the Lord, עשׂה <WH6213> But do אתי <WH854> for למען <WH4616> שׁמךי <WH3588> because טוב <WH2896> good, חסדך <WH2617> thy mercy הצילני׃ <WH5337> deliver
כי <WH3588> For עני <WH6041> poor ואביון <WH34> and needy, אנכי <WH595> I ולבי <WH3820> and my heart חלל <WH2490> is wounded בקרבי׃ <WH7130> within
כצל <WH6738> like the shadow כנטותו <WH5186> when it declineth: נהלכתי <WH1980> I am gone ננערתי <WH5287> I am tossed up and down כארבה׃ <WH697> as the locust.
ברכי <WH1290> My knees כשׁלו <WH3782> are weak מצום <WH6685> through fasting; ובשׂרי <WH1320> and my flesh כחשׁ <WH3584> faileth משׁמן׃ <WH8081> of fatness.
ואני <WH589> I הייתי <WH1961> became חרפה <WH2781> also a reproach להם <WH1992> יראוני <WH7200> unto them: they looked upon יניעון <WH5128> me they shaked ראשׁם׃ <WH7218> their heads.
עזרני <WH5826> Help יהוה <WH3068> me, O LORD אלהי <WH430> my God: הושׁיעני <WH3467> O save כחסדך׃ <WH2617> me according to thy mercy:
וידעו <WH3045> they may know כי <WH3588> That ידך <WH3027> thy hand; זאת <WH2063> that this אתה <WH859> thou, יהוה <WH3068> LORD, עשׂיתה׃ <WH6213> hast done

יקללו <WH7043> curse, המה <WH1992> Let them ואתה <WH859> thou: תברך <WH1288> but bless קמו <WH6965> when they arise, ויבשׁו <WH954> let them be ashamed; ועבדך <WH5650> but let thy servant ישׂמח׃ <WH8055> rejoice.

ילבשׁו <WH3847> be clothed שׂוטני <WH7853> Let mine adversaries כלמה <WH3639> with shame, ויעטו <WH5844> and let them cover כמעיל <WH4598> as with a mantle. בשׁתם׃ <WH1322> themselves with their own confusion,
אודה <WH3034> praise יהוה <WH3068> the LORD מאד <WH3966> I will greatly בפי <WH6310> with my mouth; ובתוך <WH8432> him among רבים <WH7227> the multitude. אהללנו׃ <WH1984> yea, I will praise
כי <WH3588> For יעמד <WH5975> he shall stand לימין <WH3225> at the right hand אביון <WH34> of the poor, להושׁיע <WH3467> to save משׁפטי <WH8199> from those that condemn נפשׁו׃ <WH5315> his soul.
